overview: The heroes of the film were the participants of the volunteer fire brigade. Where do they get the strength to fight a fire that cannot be extinguished? After all, the wildfires that happen every year cannot be extinguished forever – this war never ends. What is the strength of these people - volunteer firefighters - and what is their weakness? The film was created with donations from future viewers and became an example of a successful crowdfunding campaign. The project originated at the Fair of Ideas for Directors and Civil Activists, held within the framework of "Make a Movie" - 2013.
title: Volunteers. Playing with Fire
